verses.verse: וַ֠יִּסְעוּ <S%H5265><s%> journeyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֨ת <S%H5712><s%> And all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness סִ֛ין <S%H5512><s%> of Sin לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> after their journeys עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according to the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בִּרְפִידִ֔ים <S%H7508><s%> in Rephidim וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> and [there was] no water לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת <S%H8354><s%> to drink הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> for the people

וַיָּ֤רֶב <S%H7378><s%> did chide הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> Wherefore the people עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָ֥נוּ מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> us water וְנִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> that we may drink וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תְּרִיבוּן֙ <S%H7378><s%> unto them Why chide עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> me מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תְּנַסּ֖וּן <S%H5254><s%> ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

וַיִּצְמָ֨א <S%H6770><s%> thirsted שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people לַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> there for water וַיָּ֥לֶן <S%H3885><s%> murmured הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> now הֶעֱלִיתָ֣נוּ <S%H5927><s%> Wherefore [is] this [that] thou hast brought מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> us up out of Egypt לְהָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> to kill אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנַ֥י <S%H1121><s%> us and our children וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנַ֖י <S%H4735><s%> and our cattle בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> thirst

וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> cried מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> What shall I do לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> almost some וּסְקָלֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5619><s%> ready to stone

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> Go on לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and take אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> with thee of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמַטְּךָ֗ <S%H4294><s%> and thy rod אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכִּ֤יתָ <S%H5221><s%> wherewith thou smotest בּוֹ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> the river קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> take בְּיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand וְהָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and go

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold עֹמֵד֩ <S%H5975><s%> Behold I will stand לְפָנֶ֨יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before שָּׁ֥ם ׀ <S%H8033><s%> there עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַצּוּר֮ <S%H6697><s%> thee there upon the rock בְּחֹרֵב֒ <S%H2722><s%> in Horeb וְהִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> and thou shalt smite בַצּ֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> the rock וְיָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> and there shall come מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְשָׁתָ֣ה <S%H8354><s%> may drink הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> out of it that the people וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> so in the sight זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> And he called שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place מַסָּ֖ה <S%H4532><s%> Massah וּמְרִיבָ֑ה <S%H4809><s%> and Meribah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because רִ֣יב ׀ <S%H7379><s%> because of the chiding בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> and because נַסֹּתָ֤ם <S%H5254><s%> and because they tempted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲיֵ֧שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Is יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֖נוּ <S%H7130><s%> among אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אָֽיִן׃ <S%H369><s%> else פ

וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> Then came עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel בִּרְפִידִֽם׃ <S%H7508><s%> in Rephidim

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua בְּחַר־ <S%H977><s%> Choose us out לָ֣נוּ אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men וְצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and go out הִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> fight בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> with Amalek מָחָ֗ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I נִצָּב֙ <S%H5324><s%> I will stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on the top הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1389><s%> of the hill וּמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> with the rod הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> in mine hand

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> had said לוֹ֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> as Moses לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to him and fought בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> with Amalek וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְח֔וּר <S%H2354><s%> and Hur עָל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <S%H1389><s%> of the hill

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> held up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And it came to pass when Moses יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְגָבַ֣ר <S%H1396><s%> prevailed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> that Israel וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יָנִ֛יחַ <S%H5117><s%> and when he let down יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְגָבַ֥ר <S%H1396><s%> prevailed עֲמָלֵֽק׃ <S%H6002><s%> Amalek

וִידֵ֤י <S%H3027><s%> hands מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> But Moses' כְּבֵדִ֔ים <S%H3515><s%> [were] heavy וַיִּקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> and they took אֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> a stone וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <S%H8478><s%> under וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> [it] under him and he sat עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> thereon and Aaron וְח֜וּר <S%H2354><s%> and Hur תָּֽמְכ֣וּ <S%H8551><s%> stayed up בְיָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands מִזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> one אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> the one on the one side וּמִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> side אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> and the other on the other side וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> Thus יָדָ֛יו <S%H3027><s%> and his hands אֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> were steady עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֥א <S%H935><s%> until the going down הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun

וַיַּחֲלֹ֧שׁ <S%H2522><s%> discomfited יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֥ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כְּתֹ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> Write זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> as זִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> this [for] a memorial בַּסֵּ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in a book וְשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> and rehearse בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> [it] in the ears יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָחֹ֤ה <S%H4229><s%> for I will utterly אֶמְחֶה֙ <S%H4229><s%> put out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> the remembrance עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> of Amalek מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> from under heaven

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נִסִּֽי׃ <S%H5251><s%> is my Banner

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> For he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָד֙ <S%H3027><s%> able עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ס <S%H3676><s%> sworn יָ֔הּ <S%H3050><s%> Because the LORD מִלְחָמָ֥ה <S%H4421><s%> [will have] war לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD בַּֽעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> with Amalek מִדֹּ֖ר <S%H1755><s%> from generation דֹּֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> to generation פ
